entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
